items.name: Gene Synthesizer
items.description: A machine that spins junk DNA into the DNA of your choice.
items.effects: Requirements: None

items.name: Gene Implanter
items.effects: Allows you to install a gene mod once per turn. A human can only have 5 gene mods at one time or penalties start to happen. Requirements: None

items.name: Portable Gene Scanner
items.description: Reveals what species' DNA is present in any sample and whether itâ€™s viable for synthesis.
items.effects: Requirements: None

items.name: Cat Mod
items.description: After Implantation it allows the player to see in the dark and makes the player immune to fall damage.
items.effects: Requirements: Gene Synthesizer

items.name: Bat Mod
items.description: After Implantation it allows the player to see in a 20m radius with blindsight.
items.effects: Requirements: Gene Synthesizer

items.name: Bird Mod
items.description: After Implantation it allows the player to grow wings and fly.
items.effects: Requirements: Gene Synthesizer

items.name: Crab mod
items.description: After Implantation it forces the player to grow a crab claw which gives you a 1d8 melee dice and you grow armor plates that give you 1 armor.
items.effects: Requirements: Gene Synthesizer

items.name: Lobster mod
items.description: After Implantation the player stops aging and instead the player grows larger every year.
items.effects: Requirements: Gene Synthesizer

items.name: Spider mod
items.description: After Implantation the player can climb wall and his bite deals 3d4 poison damage after 3 turns.
items.effects: Requirements: Gene Synthesizer

items.name: Lizard mod
items.description: After Implantation the player becomes invisible to infrared and starts regenerating 1 Hp per turn.
items.effects: Requirements: Gene Synthesizer

items.name: Rat Mod
items.description: Advantage on stealth; immune to disease; squeeze through tiny holes Requirements: Gene Synthesizer
items.effects: Advantage on stealth; immune to disease; squeeze through tiny holes Requirements: Gene Synthesizer

items.name: Dog Mod
items.description: Dog ears, Or nose, Your pick
items.effects: Super-smell (track targets within 2km by scent), +2 initiative

items.name: Jellyfish Mod
items.description: Biolumenence and possibly see through skin
items.effects: Gain electroreceptors (sense movement in water), and touch deals 1d6 electric damage Requirements: Gene Synthesizer

items.name: Beetle Mod
items.description: Hardened exoskeletal patches grant +2 armor Requirements: Gene Synthesizer
items.effects: Used to make creatures from dna strands. Effect: Allows for the creation of creatures with gene mods. Requirements: None

items.name: Beetle Mod
items.description: A large pod like device that softly beats like a heart
items.effects: The Device needed to start making the tier 2 bio horrors

items.name: ## Description
items.description: Add a short description for Chemical Techie.
items.effects: This ability allows the player to build Tinker Chemicals. Only this player can use the supertech unless specified otherwise. # Lv1 Bodysuits: This suit protects the wearer from chemicals and diseases. Effects: Grants immunity to all chemical and biological attacks. Requirements: None

items.description: HyperGlue: A sticky substance that is a extremely powerful adhesive.
items.effects: Effect: When a person or object touches this substance they are stuck to it for 20 turns. Requirements: None

items.description: Boost Tonic: A sickly sweat substance that boosts one of your attributes.
items.effects: Effect: Roll 1D20 on anything but a 1 you gain 1D4 of the stat of your choice. On a 1 you take 1D4 damage. Lasts 50 turns. Requirements: None

items.description: Basic Chemical Workbench: A small bench with a distillery and some beakers.
items.effects: Requirements: None

items.description: Piranha Juice: A chemical that eats through exposed flesh.
items.effects: Effects: Deal 1D10 damage to an enemy. If they are unarmored, double this damage. Requirements: Basic Chemical workbench. â€Œ

items.description: Substance Sprayer: A gun with a long nozzle that can spray substances up to 100m.
items.effects: Effects: Increases range of all substances to 100m. Requirements: Basic Chemical workbench.

items.name: Basic Biohazard Mech Suit
items.description: HP: 100 Movespeed: 15m per turn Armor: 2 Substance Slots: 2 Effects: Can Carty 10 stacks of 2 different Chemicals.
items.effects: Completely Airtight and functions as a basic Chemical Workbench. Increases strength to 10. Requirements: Mech Suit Tinker Lv 1

items.name: Instant Pitfall
items.description: Creates a 20m deep hole at location it was thrown.
items.effects: Requirements: Fortification Tinker Lv 1

items.name: # Lv2
items.description: Enhanced Molotov: A Molotov cocktail that was made with a similar composition to Napalm and White Phosphorous.
items.effects: Effects: Lights a 10m area on fire. The fire lasts 2 hours. Damage: 1 damage per turn. Requirements: Basic Chemical Workbench.

items.name: EyeSolver
items.description: s: Causes blinding.
items.effects: Damage: 1 Requirements: Basic Chemical Workbench.

items.name: Mindwipe
items.description: s: Removes 1 days worth of memories after being ingested.
items.effects: Damage: None Requirements: Basic Chemical Workbench.

items.name: Chemical Workbench
items.description: Requirements: Basic Chemical Workbench.
items.effects: Requirements: Basic Chemical Workbench.

items.name: Gas Cloud
items.description: s: Spreads- spreads over a 1km area.
items.effects: Lasts 2 days. Damage: 1 damage per hour. Requirements: Chemical workbenchâ€Œ.

items.name: Chemical grenades
items.description: Sprays the loaded chemical in a 20m area.
items.effects: Requirements: Chemical workbench.

items.name: FluJuice
items.description: Instantly takes effect and gives the target the flu.
items.effects: Requirements: Chemical workbench.

items.name: # Lv3
items.description: Anthrax Gamma: A vial of Death.
items.effects: DO NOT USE ON ALLIES. Effect: Deals 1D4 damage per 12 hours unless treated. Requirements: Chemical workbench.

items.name: Chemical Workshop
items.description: Requirements: Chemical workbench.
items.effects: Requirements: Chemical workbench.

items.name: Resurrection Serum
items.description: Returns a target from death and heals them to full.
items.effects: Requirements: Chemical Workshop

items.name: Zombie Virus
items.description: Turns a corpse into a zombie that attacks the living.
items.effects: The zombie spreads the virus by hitting someone. Zombies have a -5 to all rolls. Requirement: Chemical Workshop.

items.name: Advanced Stat Serum
items.description: Boosts a random stat by 1D4 permanently Requirement: Chemical Workshop.
items.effects: Boosts a random stat by 1D4 permanently Requirement: Chemical Workshop.

items.name: ACDC
items.description: Allows you to apply a single chemical to the entire city Requirements: Chemical Workshop.
items.effects: Allows you to apply a single chemical to the entire city Requirements: Chemical Workshop.

items.name: Power Serum
items.description: Gives a unpowered person 1 point worth of powers chosen randomly.
items.effects: Requirements: Chemical Workshop.

items.name: Aegis of Athena
items.description: While worn it grants +4 armor.
items.effects: You have -2 to reflex. It can transform into Bow of Artemis. Range: Melee Damage: 1D4 Requirement: none

items.name: Bow of Artemis
items.description: This weapon ignores 4 armor.
items.effects: You get -2 to Smarts. It can transform into Shield of Athena Range: 75m Damage: 1d12 Requirements: none

items.name: Great Axe of Ares
items.description: Damage increases by +1 for every 30 enemies slain.
items.effects: Can Transform into Hand Axes of Enyu. Range: Melee Damage: 1d6 Requirements: none

items.name: Hand Axes of Enyu
items.description: Heal 2 health on every hit, gain +1 to this effect for every 30 enemies slain.
items.effects: Can Transform into Great Axe of Ares. Range: Melee Damage: 1d4 each Requirements: none

items.name: Staff of Dionysus
items.description: When an enemy is hit.
items.effects: Temporarily reduce their Smarts by 2. Can transform into Whip of Aphrodite. Range: Melee Damage: 1d4 Requirements: none

items.name: Whip of Aphrodite
items.description: When a character is whipped.
items.effects: Temporarily increase their social by 2. Can transform into Staff of Dionysus. Range: Melee Damage: 1d4 Requirements: none

items.name: Ring of Apollo
items.description: Gives the wearer +3 to social.
items.effects: The wearer has -3 to durability while wearing. Can Transform into Ring of Eris. Requirements: none

items.name: Ring of Eris
items.description: You can reroll 1 enemy roll per round.
items.effects: The wearer gets -3 to social while wearing. Can Transform into Ring of Apollo. # Lv2

items.name: Mace of Zeus
items.description: When you hit an enemy and an ally hits them after, the enemy takes damage equal to the amount of times this effect has been applied, Applied Additively.
items.effects: Can transform into a Bastard Sword of Hades Range: Melee Damage: 1d4 Requirements: noneâ€Œ

items.name: Bastard Sword of Hades
items.description: You can mark a target once in combat.
items.effects: This target can now only damage you and be damaged by you. When the enemy dies they can be resummoned as a ghost with 1 in every stat and their powers at 1 tenth strength. Can transform into Mace of Zeus Range Melee Damage: 1d6 Requirements: noneâ€Œ

items.name: Shuriken's of Achlys
items.description: Poisons an enemy hit to take 1 damage per turn forever.
items.effects: Can Transform into a Staff of Asclepius Range: 50m Damage: 1d4 Requirements: noneâ€Œ

items.name: Staff of Asclepius
items.description: Can be used to remove every debuff from an ally and heal them for 1d4, this effect need to be used as a action.
items.effects: Can transform into the Shuriken's of Achlys Range: 20m Damage: 1d4 Requirements: noneâ€Œ

items.name: ReVoLvEr Of KoAs
items.description: Must be found and can not be built.
items.effects: When you shoot an enemy you roll a 1d100. The DM decides what the bullet does. Range: 100m Damage: 1d10 Requirements: noneâ€Œ

items.name: Greaves of Hermes
items.description: You go one higher in the initiative order.
items.effects: You get 1 free turn before the combat begins. You move faster than your party members. Can Transform into Fingerless Gloves of Chronos. Requirements: Noneâ€Œ

items.name: Fingerless Gloves of Chronos
items.description: Provides hidden bonus.
items.effects: Every second attack moves an enemy 1 step down in the initiative order. Requirements: Noneâ€Œ # Lv3

items.name: Book of the Athenian Dolomite
items.description: You may ask the book any question.
items.effects: The DM then secretly rolls 1d4. On a 1 the book gives the truth. On a 2 or 3 the book gives 42 and 24 unrespectivly. On a 4 the book gives a believable lie. Requirements: Noneâ€Œ

items.name: Axe of Bloody Matrimony

items.name: ## Description
items.description: Add a short description for Modular Items Techie.
items.effects: Only you can use these items unless specified otherwise. - The player chooses **up to 3 modules** from this list. - They glue them together with a base chassis (free). - The final weapon gains **all ranges, damages, and effects** from every attached module. - If two modules give different ranges, it uses the **longest**. - If two modules give different damage dice, all dice apply. - If the weapon has both melee and ranged modules, it becomes **hybrid**. # Lv1 Long Barrel: A extended long barrel to increase accuracy. Range: 30m Damage: 1d4 Effect: +2 to hit with ranged attacks

items.name: Short Barrel
items.description: Range: 10m Damage: 1d6 Effect: You can switch to this weapon as a free action
items.effects: Range: 10m Damage: 1d6 Effect: You can switch to this weapon as a free action

items.name: Split Shot
items.description: Damage: 1d4 Effect: Your attacks are split randomly across all the enemies in a cone.
items.effects: Damage: 1d4 Effect: Your attacks are split randomly across all the enemies in a cone.

items.name: Stabilizer Grip
items.description: Consecutive attacks against the same enemy give +1 to hit.
items.effects: Consecutive attacks against the same enemy give +1 to hit.

items.name: Shock Battery
items.description: Range: Melee Effect: Once per turn.
items.effects: You stun an enemy on hit with a dc 6 durability save

items.name: Hydro Gloves
items.description: **Cost:** $10 **Effect:** Lets you extract water from the air or liquids.
items.effects: Produces up to **1 liter per turn**. Reduces taken water/cold damage by 1. **Requirements:** None

items.name: Slickfoam Capsule
items.description: **Cost:** $10 **Effect:** Creates a **5m patch** of hyper-slippery foam.
items.effects: - Anyone moving through must roll Reflex 5 or fall prone. - Foam lasts 5 turns. **Requirements:** None

items.name: Chillburst Vial
items.description: **Cost:** $50 **Effect:** On breaking, creates a **5m burst of freezing mist**.
items.effects: - Deals **1d4 cold damage**. - Reflex 5 or movement is halved for 1 turn. **Requirements:** None

items.name: Basic Hydromechanics Bench
items.description: **Cost:** $100 **Requirements:** None
items.effects: **Cost:** $100 **Requirements:** None

items.name: Cryo Slush Grenade
items.description: **Cost:** $100 **Effect:** On detonation creates a **5m frost patch**.
items.effects: - Immediate **1d6 cold damage** - Targets must pass a Durability 5 check or take **1d4 cold damage for 3 turns** **Requirements:** Basic Hydromechanics Bench

items.name: Pressure Nozzle
items.description: **Cost:** $1000 **Effect:** Increases range of your liquids and chemicals to **20m**.
items.effects: **Requirements:** Basic Hydromechanics Bench

items.name: Insulated Diving Suit
items.description: **Cost:** $1000 **Effect:** - Reduces taken **cold and water damage by 4** - Allows underwater breathing for **1 hour** **Requirements:** None
items.effects: **Cost:** $1000 **Effect:** - Reduces taken **cold and water damage by 4** - Allows underwater breathing for **1 hour** **Requirements:** None

items.name: Water Lance Charge
items.description: **Cost:** $1000 **Effect:** Creates a **10m linear water blast**.
items.effects: - Deals **2d6 cutting damage** - Ignores **2 armor** - Pierces through soft cover **Requirements:** Basic Hydromechanics Bench
